useCase.name: Menu Management
useCase.trigger: Manager selects Menu Management from the interface

mainSequence.step: Manager accesses the Menu Management functionality
Management Interface requests current menu items from Backend Server
Backend Server fetches menu items from the Database
Database provides menu items data to Backend Server
Backend Server displays menu items to Management Interface
Management Interface sends an update menu items request to Backend Server
Backend Server updates menu items in the Database
Backend Server confirms the successful update with the Database
Backend Server returns the confirmation of a successful update to Management Interface
Management Interface displays a success message to the Manager
